item.title: CVE-2023-20702|2024-08-02T09:14:40.992Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6835%2C%20mt6873%2C%20mt6875%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6883%2C%20mt6885%2C%20mt6886%2C%20mt6889%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6980%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt6985%2C%20mt6990%2C%20mt8673%2C%20mt8675%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8791t%2C%20mt8797%2C%20mt8798
item.description: In 5G NRLC, there is a possible invalid memory access due to lack of error handling. This could lead to remote denial of service, if UE received invalid 1-byte rlc sdu, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: MOLY00921261; Issue ID: MOLY01128895.
